r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $936.4K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Korn Ferry Ca. The average
  contract duration was 0.89 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $94.5K. The longest
  contract was 4.64 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.1M.
lookup_name: 'KORN FERRY CA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '936.4K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '43'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '22%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.6'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '536.3K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.89'
s421_mean_contract_value: '94.5K'
s425_max_duration: '4.64'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.1M'
